function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential risk of inadequate surveillance and monitoring of infectious diseases in indoor environments","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreak within buildings","Mitigation":"Implementing advanced monitoring technologies and surveillance systems, establishing strict hygiene protocols, and promoting vaccination and testing programs","Technologies":"IoT sensors for real-time monitoring, AI-based surveillance systems, data analytics for trend analysis","People":"Indoor occupants, visitors, and essential workers","Owner":"Building management and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Risks associated with insufficient data representation and semantic analysis of COVID-19 information","Impact":"Inaccurate analysis and prediction of disease spread and behavior","Mitigation":"Enhancing ontology-based models for comprehensive data representation, improving data semantics, and validating data accuracy","Technologies":"Ontology-based reasoning systems, semantic web technologies, natural language processing for data interpretation","People":"Biomedical researchers, public health professionals, and data analysts","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Limited capabilities in addressing technical challenges of COVID-19 analytics","Impact":"Inadequate understanding of the disease transmission patterns and limited support for decision-making processes","Mitigation":"Investing in research and development of advanced data analytics methods, improving interoperability of existing solutions, and enhancing data visualization techniques","Technologies":"Data mining algorithms, machine learning for pattern recognition, interactive data visualization tools","People":"Healthcare researchers, data scientists, and healthcare professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare organizations"}]}
